article_text:
Age: 11

Occupation: Student at Westview Middle School, Girl Scout.

How many years have you been in the St. Vrain Valley? 11 years.

What brought you here? What has kept you here? My parents.

How did you get involved in Girl Scouts? Before me, my sister was a Girl Scout for a few years, so when I came into kindergarten, I wanted join.

What's the best thing about being involved in Girl Scouts? I really enjoy connecting with all the other girls and I love doing all the community service that our troop does. Last year we painted a map of the United States on the blacktop for our school's playground.
